lessons_learned: Foundation-first approach: Grade cards are the foundation - websites must pass comprehensive audits before scaling revenue
Multi-engine strategy: 4 revenue engines with different roles (Authority, Product, Brand, Cash-Flow Anchor) work together as one spine
Failure mode guards: Hard stops for trading (account protection) and marketing (noise generation) are non-negotiable
Swarm OS leverage: Existing infrastructure (messaging, agents, automation) can power marketing machine with phased rollout
